archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.11a: a) deploying patches to systems that are not accessible via the corporate network (e.g. stand-alone endpoint devices) or devices that connect to the corporate network infrequently (e.g. used by travelling employees)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
